programmes.show_description: Joe has the biggest hits from the world's hottest artists, wherever you are! | @CapitalOfficial
Ant's bringing you all the chat and biggest tunes to get you through the early hours | @CapitalOfficial
Buckle up! Jordan, Chris and Sian have got the best tunes, hugest interviews and the biggest laughs to start your day. | @CapitalOfficial
Kemi is bringing you all the hottest hits to get you through the morning | @CapitalOfficial
Aimee's bringing you all the goss and biggest tunes to get you through the afternoon | @CapitalOfficial
Will Manning is ON! Hits and... honestly, whatever else he thinks up. Say hey on WhatsApp, 0345 6000 958 | @CapitalOfficial
Jimmy's having fun with our fave celebrity friends and playing the biggest songs in the world right now | @CapitalOfficial
Sonny's here with your late-night soundtrack, bringing you the biggest hits and lots of laughs | @CapitalOfficial
